title: Snakemake Configuration
description: A configuration file for a snakemake pipeline.

Reference Genome.description: The reference genome details needed to validate this VCF file

Name.description: The version name of the reference genome

Folder Name.description: The name of the folder in the projects `resources` folder where the Reference Genome is located.

Reference SNPs.description: The reference SNP file (VCF format) details needed to validate the given input file against

Source Name.description: The name of the source from which the SNPs will be validated against

Version.description: The version of the Reference SNP VCF file

Filename.description: The name of the VCF file, as located in the resources folder

Folder Name.description: The name of the folder in the projects `resources` folder where the Reference SNPs VCF is located.

Data.description: The data (VCF format) to be validated against the VCF spesification

VCF Version.description: The version number of the VCF spesification to validate against

Name.description: The name of the dataset to be used in naming the output file

Folder Name.description: The name of the folder in the projects `resources` folder where the data is located.
